saviMIB.name: saviMIB
saviMIB.contactinfo: Changqing An Postal: Network Research Center, Tsinghua University Beijing 100084 China Email: acq@tsinghua.edu.cn
saviMIB.description: The MIB Module for managing SAVI implementations.

saviObjectsSystemTable.name: saviObjectsSystemTable
saviObjectsSystemTable.description: The table containing savi system-wide parameters.

saviObjectsSystemEntry.name: saviObjectsSystemEntry
saviObjectsSystemEntry.description: Each entry containing savi system-wide parameters for a particular IP version.

saviObjectsSystemMaxDadDelay.name: saviObjectsSystemMaxDadDelay
saviObjectsSystemMaxDadDelay.description: A constant. When A gratuitous ARP Request or Duplicate Address Detection Neighbor Solicitation is received from anchor, the lifetime of the BST(Binding State Table) entry MUST be set to be MAX_ARP_DELAY or MAX_DAD_DELAY respectively.

saviObjectsSystemMaxDadPrepareDelay.name: saviObjectsSystemMaxDadPrepareDelay
saviObjectsSystemMaxDadPrepareDelay.description: A constant. When a DHCPv4 DHCPACK or DHCPv6 REPLY message is received, the lifetime of the BST(Binding State Table) entry MUST be set to be MAX_ARP_PREPARE_DELAY or MAX_DAD_PREPARE_DELAY respectively.

saviObjectsIfTable.name: saviObjectsIfTable
saviObjectsIfTable.description: The table containing SAVI running parameters of each anchor.

saviObjectsIfEntry.name: saviObjectsIfEntry
saviObjectsIfEntry.description: An entry containing SAVI running parameters of an anchor.

saviObjectsIfIfIndex.name: saviObjectsIfIfIndex
saviObjectsIfIfIndex.description: The index value that uniquely identifies the interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value of the IF-MIB's ifIndex.

saviObjectsIfValidationStatus.name: saviObjectsIfValidationStatus
saviObjectsIfValidationStatus.description: The validation status of the interface. enable(1), check source address. disable(2), don't check source address.

saviObjectsIfTrustStatus.name: saviObjectsIfTrustStatus
saviObjectsIfTrustStatus.description: The trust status of the interface. no-trust(1), discard dhcp adv/reply and ra packet, dhcp-trust(2), permit dhcp adv/reply packet and discard ra packet, ra-trust(3), permit ra packet and discard dhcp adv/reply packet, dhcp-ra-trust(4), permit dhcp adv/reply and ra packet.

saviObjectsIfFilteringNum.name: saviObjectsIfFilteringNum
saviObjectsIfFilteringNum.description: The max filtering number of the Interface

saviObjectsBindingTable.name: saviObjectsBindingTable
saviObjectsBindingTable.description: The Binding State Table containing the state of binding between source address and anchor.

saviObjectsBindingEntry.name: saviObjectsBindingEntry
saviObjectsBindingEntry.description: An entry containing the state of binding between source address and anchor. Entries are keyed on the anchor, binding type, source IP address version, and source IP address.

saviObjectsBindingIpAddressType.name: saviObjectsBindingIpAddressType
saviObjectsBindingIpAddressType.description: IP address type of the binding source IP

saviObjectsBindingIfIndex.name: saviObjectsBindingIfIndex
saviObjectsBindingIfIndex.description: The index value that uniquely identifies the interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value of the IF-MIB's ifIndex.

saviObjectsBindingState.name: saviObjectsBindingState
saviObjectsBindingState.description: The state of the binding entry.

saviObjectsBindingLifetime.name: saviObjectsBindingLifetime
saviObjectsBindingLifetime.description: The remaining lifetime of the entry. If saviObjectsBindingType=static, a value of 2147483647 represents infinity.

saviObjectsBindingRowStatus.name: saviObjectsBindingRowStatus
saviObjectsBindingRowStatus.description: The status of this row, by which new entries may be created, or old entries deleted from this table. An Entry can be created or deleted only when saviObjectsBindingType=static.

saviObjectsFilteringTable.name: saviObjectsFilteringTable
saviObjectsFilteringTable.description: The Filtering Table is used to filter packets.

saviObjectsFilteringEntry.name: saviObjectsFilteringEntry
saviObjectsFilteringEntry.description: An entry containing the filtering parameters. Entries are keyed on the anchor.

saviObjectsFilteringIpAddressType.name: saviObjectsFilteringIpAddressType
saviObjectsFilteringIpAddressType.description: IP address type of the filtering source IP

saviObjectsFilteringIfIndex.name: saviObjectsFilteringIfIndex
saviObjectsFilteringIfIndex.description: The index value that uniquely identifies the interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value of the IF-MIB's ifIndex.

saviCompliance.name: saviCompliance
saviCompliance.description: The compliance statement for entities which implement SAVI.

systemGroup.name: systemGroup
systemGroup.description: The system group of objects containing savi system parameter.

ifGroup.name: ifGroup
ifGroup.description: The if group of objects containing the savi running parameters of each anchor.

bindingGroup.name: bindingGroup
bindingGroup.description: The binding group of objects containing the binding information of anchor and soure ip address.

filteringGroup.name: filteringGroup
filteringGroup.description: The filtering group of objects containing the filtering information of anchor and soure ip address.
